::Lord Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus rose up from the CR tank.
   
  Jhiaxus: Feeling better. Whats next on the agenda?
   
  ::Hot Rod::
   
  As Hot Rod regained feeling the hate was swelling in him. He was slowly tensing up and started pulling his arms to try and break the bonds tieing them.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

"Hope so, the effects of the paralize shot will ends soon"Hissed 
Hydras.

Perceptor sensed that something was happening with Rodimus

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod could feel the effects wearing off. Feeling was starting 
to return to the sensors in his limbs.
> 
> ::Zarak::
> 
> Zarak had found some things to help his healing. One CR tank 
beeped. Zarak's Headmaster exo-suit was repaired. He pulls it out and 
puts the suit back on.
> 
> Zarak: Much better. Now we just wait on Jhiaxus. He should be 
done soon.
> 
>
